sentence.text: Routine gene testing is not necessary to guide treatment for typical forms of paroxysmal kinesigenic dyskinesia (PKD), paroxysmal nonkinesigenic dyskinesia (negative regulation of neurotransmitter secretion), and episodic ataxia type 1 or 2.

Antiepileptic drugs remain the treatment of choice for PKD and episodic ataxia type 1, benzodiazepines are often useful for negative regulation of neurotransmitter secretion, and episodic ataxia type 2 benefits from acetazolamide regardless of the genetic etiology
